EmailTemplate.subject: Using CommCare to build mHealth tools: Webinar this week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dimagi is hosting two free 90-minute webinars this March about our mobile platform CommCare. This webinar series provides participants with training on advanced technical topics for CommCare. To join either or both webinars, please sign up here:
http://dimagi.us5.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=3723a6bdc9bae1db8dda1623e&id=8f8681bcfa&utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=CommCare
CommCare 101: An Introduction to CommCare (Wed, 3/25 from 10-11:30 AM EDT): This webinar will provide a general overview of the CommCare platform, including looking at specific CommCare use cases. We will demonstrate how to build and deploy mobile applications using CommCare, and see how these mobile applications function on a phone.The webinar will end with Q&A from participants. This webinar is geared towards folks who haven’t used CommCare before and are interested in learning more about building mobile apps using CommCare.
Building Mobile Apps In CommCare: A Deep Dive Into the CommCare Form Builder (Monday, 3/30 from 10-11:30am EDT): This webinar will provide participants with an overview of how to use CommCare’s form builder. Designed for non-programmers, the CommCare form builder enables people to build and deploy their own forms to register and track people or things of interest. Participants will learn about different question types the form builder supports, how to use basic and advanced logic (including display conditions, validation, and hidden values), and how to add multimedia (including images, audio, and videos) to your mobile forms. The webinar will end with Q&A from participants.
To join either or both webinars, please sign up using the link above. If you have questions, please email webinars@dimagi.com.
Thanks, Christina
